name: OnlyUp
description:
This game is not complete yet so sorry for bugs and stuff. Also this game is probably a rage game :)

Fallen, you have to get to your body so you can wake up and the only way to get to your body is up. Dodge enemies, jump around and go up to find yourself sleeping.

How to play:

use WASD or Arrow keys to move around and jump.  

Goal: to get to the top and get back to your body.

watch out for: enemies(purple things)

if the game is not working like the player can move then just restart then page or click R

hope you enjoy this bad game, didn't really have much time to finish but might finish it later on.

Blockhead manic
